sys_hub_flow.description: Monitors negative comments. Creates a Problem record when the threshold is exceeded.
sys_hub_flow.name: Social Media Comment Checker

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update all monitor.social media problem field --> 6 - Problem Record

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get the configuration item that matches (Input➛monitor_sys_id➛Source)
